mapper.delete: DELETE cart FROM cart JOIN member ON cart.member_id = member.idx WHERE cart.member_id = #{memberId} AND member.deletion_yn = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id, c.member_id, c.product_id, c.quantity, p.pname AS pname, p.pprice AS pprice FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.cart_id = #{cartId}
